title: What are weal and samarpana clubs mainly do?
content: Since both these are recruiting students, i as a first year student don't know what exactly they do. Is it good joining these clubs?

comments.body: More clubs will be announcing recruitments!

WEAL is apparently a mental health focused club, I have heard of them organising ideathons and all that. For AT last year ( aatmatrisha aka AT is the main fest), they had organised family feud too.   
Samarpana organised a marathon anol last year. I think it's about volunteering anol, especially during independence day and stuff they have things.

Btw, check out linguista! if you haven't already. We are a club of language enthusiasts and learners !! We are opening recruitments too !!

[https://forms.gle/jxtpFU1Rt7F7T6er8](https://forms.gle/jxtpFU1Rt7F7T6er8)
